name: The Milkman (themorfeus)
description:
In a world where you can get three different kinds of milk - red, green and blue - you use your telekinetic powers to throw said milk at your customers. But be wary, each customer will wait only 10 seconds, and someone organized your booth very badly.

Have fun!

(You can’t lose in this game. Literally. Didn’t have time to put it in. Have fun anyway.)
